commonEnglish: Dog Gall Bladder, Kidney or Bladder Stone

contraindications: Contraindicated for for those with weakness of the Spleen and Stomach
Contraindicated for for those with Deficiency of Qi and Blood.

notes: One source says that this substance treats osteomyelitis, watery diarrhea and toothache from Cold in the face.
it is applied to blackened and swollen wounds.
It is said that mixed with vinegar and applied, it will remove scars.
